description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\User\Business\UserFacade::setCurrentUser()()` is using an invalid return type `mixed` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."

`UserCommunicationFactory::createSecurityServiceExtender()` in `Spryker\Zed\User\Communication\UserCommunicationFactory::createSecurityServiceExtender()` contains 2 new statements which violates rule "A `create*()` method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."
